Text: Re Inlandpst Thank you very much I am working on it as we speak I will let you know as soon as it is all signed and sealed Hope you have a good weekend as well Brandi

FW LRC TerminalCan you please call me ASAP to discuss the items requestedAre we going to need a CA first Etc Original Message From Soriero Tommy mailto EAICOM Sent Thursday November AM To Morris Brandi Subject LRC Terminal Brandi Please see the list of requested documents and information concerning the Louisiana Resources Company pipeline and terminal We have also listed a number of questions concerning separate issues about the facility and pipeline that we would like to discuss Some of the requests are redundant to our previous discussions Thanks List and copies of all applicable state and federal agency permits for ownershipoperations of the pipeline terminal and pierdock facilities in state waters Copies of all surface use agreements rightofways easements and leases for the combination of facilities and what ongoing costs are associated with each All other agreements that affect the operations andor the ownership of the rights of way andor surface use including but not limited to concurrent use agreements ie where there are two pipelines within the same right of way Operating Agreements Agreements with the Owner of the Gas Plant at the beginning point of the pipeline system marketing agreements etc if any Copies of any environmental audits or reviews of the facilities Historical operating statements for the facilities Copies of all lease agreements for the use of the facilities Genesis and others Copies of any structural or integrity reviews or assessments of the facilities Please provide a description of all jurisdictional authority matters that affect the ownershipoperations of the facility A list of any past violations spills or other accidents Copylist of all title documents to be conveyed in the sale including the ROW interests and leases List of consents needed for transfer of the assets being purchased Copies of any specific insurance requirements Please explain the responsibilities for the decommissioningabandonment of the facility Copies of construction permits from the federal state and parish agencies that address natural and cultural resources along with any compensatory mitigation agreements for resource damages Regulatory compliance records environmental and safety for DOT or Louisiana Office of Pipeline Safety as well as alignment sheets What is the agreementresponsibility of the parties with respect to the old Swift gas plant at the end of the pipeline Does LRCs responsibility extend to the border of the site or is the site under the responsibility of LRC Who is the current owner of this site if not LRC Are there any agreements between the owner of this facility and LRC Are there any known noncompliance issues with respect to the facilitys operations or current designlayout Has there been any leaks within the system Does the Genesis contract require them to pig the line before their lease expires We will most likely need to have the entire line pigged prior to the transfer of ownership What is the selling entity for these assets If preexisting liabilities are discovered what selling entity would be financially responsible What will be the status of the tank inventory and linefill upon closing the transaction

FW CAHere is the name for the CA If you could just email me the draft I will send it back to Dee today Thanks Original Message From Davis Dee mailto Sent Friday November AM To Morris Brandi Subject CA Brandi Just use Torch Energy Advisors Incorporated in the CA with the address noted below Thanks Dee B Dee Davis Jr Director International Business Development Torch Energy Advisors Incorporated Lamar Street Suite Houston Texas USA T F Email

FW Ice Drilling legal fees Just wanted to send a reminder regarding my last email Can you give me any update today Thanks Brandi Original Message From Morris Brandi Sent Monday April PM To Sanders Richard Subject FW Ice Drilling legal fees In our quest to get a handle on all of these lawsuitsI was wondering if you have an estimate of when Ice Drilling may come to a conclusion and how much more it will cost Kristi gave me a year to date schedule if that helps Thanks Brandi Original Message From Fredericks Kristi Sent Monday April PM To Morris Brandi Cc Lamb Marnie Subject Ice Drilling legal fees Brandi Here is a detail of the bankruptcy legal fees pertaining to Ice Drilling Let me know if you have any questions Kristi Voinis x
